scripture: O Lord, open my lips, and my mouth will declare your praise.
message: Take a moment to do a spiritual check up today and spend time with God. If you can, find three short moments to be in God's presence.

scripture: I was glad when they said unto me, “We will go into the house of the Lord.”
message: Hopefully you found time yesterday to do a spiritual check up. Continue the rhythm today. If you can, find three short moments to be in God's presence.

scripture: I will bless the Lord at all times; his praise shall continually be in my mouth.
message: Keep up the rhythm of spending time with God. If you can, find three short moments to be in God's presence.

scripture: Let the words of my mouth and the meditation of my heart be always acceptable in your sight, O Lord, my rock and my redeemer.
message: Enjoy your time with God today. If you can, find three short moments to be in God's presence.

scripture: I will sing to the Lord, for he has dealt bountifully with me.
message: God has been good to you. Take a moment to thank him for his goodness. If you can, find three short moments to be in God's presence.

scripture: Seven times a day I praise You Because of Your righteous judgments.
message: Take a moment to praise God for his righteousness. If you can, find three short moments to be in God's presence.

scripture: Let my prayer be set forth in your sight as incense, and let the lifting up of my hands be an evening sacrifice.
message: This marks the last day of these spiritual check up reminders. I hope you have enjoyed them. On this last day, find three short moments to be in God's presence. Continue to take joy in the presence of the Lord.
